lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic was dumped out of the Rio Games in the first round on Sunday by Argentina's Juan Martin del Potro, a shock result that reduced the Serb to tears as he left the court.
snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic was dumped out of the Rio Games in the first round on Sunday by Argentina's Juan Martin del Potro, a shock result that reduced the Serb to tears as he left the court....

headline.main: Del Potro Sends Djokovic Packing in Rio Shock
headline.print_headline: Del Potro Sends Djokovic Packing in Rio Shock
